title: 1.045 STATE, CONSENT TO ACQUISITION OF LANDS.
text: Consent of the state of Minnesota is given to the acquisition by the United States in any manner authorized by act of Congress of lands lying within the original boundaries of the Chippewa National Forest and the Superior National Forest for any purpose incident to the development or maintenance of those forests, subject to concurrent jurisdiction of the state and the United States as defined in section 1.041.

variables.name: state
variables.description: The state where the land is located.

variables.name: land_location
variables.description: The specific location of the land within the national forests.

variables.name: acquisition_method
variables.description: The method by which the land is acquired.

variables.name: authorized_by_congress
variables.description: The method of acquisition authorized by Congress.

consequences: Consent is given for the acquisition of land by the United States.
